TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Action implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.ActionBase

summary.span: 表示一个 Word 文档中的智能标记操作，该文档通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具进行自定义。

span.span: Represents a smart tag action in a Word document that is customized by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特定类型的智能标记识别时，操作是在智能标记快捷菜单上的可用选项。Actions are the choices available on the smart tag shortcut menu when a smart tag of a certain type is recognized. 若要创建操作，请使用`Globals.Factory.CreateAction`方法来创建对象。To create an action, use the `Globals.Factory.CreateAction` method to create an object. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage 此类型旨在用于 Word 2007 仅在项目中。This type is intended to be used only in projects for Word 2007. Word 2010 中已弃用智能标记。Smart tags are deprecated in Word 2010.. [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建操作的智能标记。The following code example demonstrates how to create a smart tag with an action. 智能标记操作修改在运行时操作的菜单标题，并显示已识别的文本的位置。The smart tag action modifies the menu caption of the action at run time and displays the location of the text that was recognized. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordSmartTags#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordSmartTags/CS/thisdocument.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordSmartTags#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordSmartTags/VB/thisdocument.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: 在用户单击智能标记图标之后、智能标记菜单显示之前发生。Occurs after the user clicks the smart tags icon, and before the smart tag menu is displayed. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用于更改基于上下文的智能标记标题。This event gives you an opportunity to change the smart tag caption based on context. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序将修改操作的菜单标题。The event handler modifies the menu caption of the action. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_WordSmartTags#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordSmartTags/CS/thisdocument.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordSmartTags#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordSmartTags/VB/thisdocument.vb#3)]

Docs.summary: 在智能标记菜单中的操作被单击时发生。Occurs when the action in the smart tag menu is clicked. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序会显示智能标记识别的术语的开始和结束位置。The event handler displays the start and end position of the recognized smart tag term. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_WordSmartTags#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordSmartTags/CS/thisdocument.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordSmartTags#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordSmartTags/VB/thisdocument.vb#4)]
